Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Holiday Inn Express Chester - Racecourse places you in the heart of Chester, walking distance from Chester Racecourse and Dewa Roman Experience. This hotel is within close proximity of Grosvenor Museum and St Peter's Church.

Rooms
Stay in one of 97 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Chester? This hotel has facilities measuring 192 square feet (17 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Holiday Inn Express Chester - Racecourse places you in the heart of Chester, walking distance from Chester Racecourse and Dewa Roman Experience. This hotel is within close proximity of Grosvenor Museum and St Peter's Church.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Chester Racecourse - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Dewa Roman Experience - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Grosvenor Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
St Peter's Church - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi

Chester Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Chester Castle - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Chester City Walls - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi

Newgate - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Old Dee Bridge - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Chester Golf Club - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Roman Amphitheatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Grosvenor Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Northgate Arena Leisure Centre - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Liverpool (LPL-John Lennon) - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi
Manchester (MAN) - 45.9 km / 28.5 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Chester - Racecourse is Manchester (MAN).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express Chester Racecourse is Manchester (MAN-Manchester Intl.) - 45.9 km / 28.5 mi.
